detail: Watch our video to find out what it's like to study at Oxford as an international graduate student.
We're committed to welcoming the brightest students from all over the world.
Our guidance on making an application to Oxford as an international student.
Our guide to which grades and qualifications are considered equivalent to the University's entry requirements.
International students must be able to meet the University's requirements for English language proficiency.
On this page, you can find more information about visa requirements and the Academic Technology Approval Scheme (ATAS).
